data.feedback: The plan comprehensively covers all 9 Flutter epics requested by the user. File verification shows existing files are correctly identified for modification, and new files are appropriately marked for creation. The architecture follows Flutter best practices with clean architecture layers. Backend API integration is properly mapped. Only minor issues found (MainActivity path, duplicate deps) which don't block execution.
issues: MainActivity.kt path in epic-platform-config should be filesToModify at correct path: android/app/src/main/kotlin/com/example/pasos/app_pasos_frontend/MainActivity.kt
Duplicate dependencies in epic-ui-foundation and epic-auth-ui (minor)
suggestions: Fix MainActivity.kt path to match actual package structure
Remove duplicate dependency entries for cleaner execution graph
